articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Repo rate hiked again; RBI retains GDP growth forecast at 7.2% - Hindustan Times
articles.description: RBI Monetary Policy: The real GDP growth for the current year has been retained at 7.2%, RBI governor Shaktikanta Das said. Inflation has been revised to 6.7% from 5.7% earlier for the current year.
articles.content: The Reserve Bank of India on Wednesday increased the repo rate by 50 basis points to 4.90%. The current repo rate is 4.40% after the rates were increased by 40 basis points at an off-cycle meeting of… [+2292 chars]

articles.description: Since the outbreak of the Ukraine war, Indian state-run and private refiners have significantly raised their intake of Russian oil thats been selling at a deep discount to the global benchmarks. But average discounts availed by Indian refiners on a delivered …
